statements: UPDATE kitchen_inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE item_name = 'Apples';
UPDATE kitchen_inventory SET supplier_name = 'Fresh Produce Co.' WHERE quantity < 20;
UPDATE kitchen_inventory SET quantity = 10, last_ordered_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE item_id = 1
UPDATE kitchen_inventory SET quantity = 20, supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers' WHERE item_name = 'Sugar'
UPDATE smart_kitchen_appliances SET quantity_in_stock = 10 WHERE appliance_id = 1;
UPDATE supply_orders SET delivery_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE order_id = 1001;
UPDATE smart_kitchen_appliances SET quantity_in_stock = quantity_in_stock - 1 WHERE appliance_id = 101
UPDATE supply_orders SET order_date = '2023-05-15', delivery_date = '2023-06-25' WHERE order_id = 201
UPDATE inventory SET stock_quantity = 10 WHERE appliance_id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET status = 'Shipped' WHERE order_id = 1001;
UPDATE inventory SET stock_quantity = stock_quantity - 5 WHERE appliance_id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_person = 'John Doe', contact_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE appliances SET quantity = 50 WHERE appliance_id = 1
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_number = '+1-123-456-7890' WHERE supplier_id = 2
UPDATE appliances SET quantity = 10 WHERE appliance_id = 1;
UPDATE stock SET quantity = quantity + 50 WHERE appliance_id = 2;
